Articles.Content: So yeah, would there be a possibility to add mods (i.e. MechJeb, or whateve) into the tech tree or make it available in Career Mode? It would probably come down to a couple of extra lines in the parts.cfg I guess, but does somebody know what these lines have to be? I really can't wait to see mods in career mode :-)

Check this post http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53025-Science-and-mods!

All you really need to do is to add TechRequired = start to the part config.
